channel.title: [REQ]Fully Working Mining[REQ]
channel.description:
Well i have added some codes but they all don't work.
I wanted to know how you make it mine till your inventory is full.
My mining is all fucked up.
Thankyou to anyone who can help out ;D

item.title: [REQ]Fully Working Mining[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

addItem(Item2.randomcrystalmine(), 4);

u need to have that.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Fully Working Mining[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @babidi28 babidi28
item.description:
@babidi28 wrote:

I tried this:

case 2091: //copper rock if(actionTimer == 0) if(playerHasItem(1275)==false) { sendMessage("You Need a rune picKaxe to mine for Copper."); } else if(playerHasItem(1275)==true) { if(actionTimer == 0) sendMessage("You get some copper ore"); addItem(436, 1); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[12]), 12); actionTimer = 15; } but it didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Fully Working Mining[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

case 4926: if(actionTimer == 0) if(playerHasItem(1275)==false) { sendMessage("You Need a rune pic axe to mine for crystals."); } else if(playerHasItem(1275)==true) { if(actionTimer == 0) sendMessage("You get some crystals"); addItem(Item2.randomcrystalmine(), 4); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[12]), 12); actionTimer = 15; }
my crystal mining for crafting. it will work with reg mining to just gda edit a bit.

Read full topic
